# materials-datatable



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                            | Type                       | Default     |
| -------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`        | `color`          | Set the color scheme for the datatable | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `undefined` |
| `dense`        | `dense`          | Apply low density on the element       | `boolean`                  | `undefined` |
| `oddEvenStyle` | `odd-even-style` | Apply odd style to the element         | `boolean`                  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event  | Description                      | Type                |
| ------ | -------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `sort` | Emitted when datatable is sorted | `CustomEvent<Sort>` |
